Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.repository

Schnittstelle CategoryRepository

Alle Superschnittstellen:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Category,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Category,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Category,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Category,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Category,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Category>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Category,Long>
public interface CategoryRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Category,Long>
Interface for CategoryRepository which extends JpaRepository and provides additional methods for retrieving Category objects
Seit:
28-01-2023

  • Methodendetails

    • findCategoriesByOwner

      List<Category> findCategoriesByOwner(User owner)
      This method finds all categories that belong to a specific user.
      Parameter:
      owner - the user whose categories will be retrieved
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of Category objects belonging to the user

    • findCategoriesByCategoryName

      List<Category> findCategoriesByCategoryName(String CategoryName)
      This method finds all categories that have a specific name.
      Parameter:
      CategoryName - the name of the categories to be retrieved
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of Category objects with the specified name

    • getCategoryById

      Category getCategoryById(Long id)
      This method finds a specific category by its ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the ID of the category to be retrieved
      Gibt zurück:
      the Category object with the specified ID
